cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DCMAKE_MAKE_PROGRAM=make -G "CodeBlocks - Unix Makefiles" -S /home/carlos/development/toolbox -B /home/carlos/development/toolbox/cmake-build-debug

  Support for "Extra Generators" like

    CodeBlocks

  is deprecated and will be removed from a future version of CMake.  IDEs may
  use the cmake-file-api(7) to view CMake-generated project build trees.
